TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExceptionSummary extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.ExceptionSummarization.ExceptionSummary>
Public Structure ExceptionSummary Implements IEquatable(Of ExceptionSummary)

Docs.summary: Holds a summary of an exception for use in telemetry.
Docs.remarks:
Metric tags typically support a limited number of distinct values, and as such they are not suitable to represent values that are highly variable, such as the result of . An exception summary represents a low-cardinality version of an exception's information, suitable for such cases.
The property never includes sensitive information. But the property might contain sensitive information and thus shouldn't be used in telemetry.

Docs.param: A summary description string for telemetry.
An additional details string, primarily for diagnostics and not telemetry.

Docs.summary: Gets the additional details of the exception.
Docs.remarks: This string can have a relatively high cardinality and may contain privacy-sensitive information and is therefore not suitable as a metric dimension. It is primarily intended for use in low-level diagnostics.

Docs.summary: Gets the summary description of the exception.
Docs.remarks: This is a low cardinality string suitable for use as a metric dimension, and it is guaranteed not to contain privacy-sensitive information.

Docs.summary: Gets the type description of the exception.
Docs.remarks: This is not guaranteed to be a type name. In particular, for inner exceptions, this will include the type name of the outer exception along with the type name of the inner exception.
